UnitDefinition.Name: Concentration model choice types
UnitDefinition.Description: Accepted Concentration model choice types. Controlled terminology.

Unit.Name: Custom
Unit.Description: By setting this tier to custom, the exposure model can be configured in any way desirable (without tier specific presets). The model is fully specified by the user. Both EFSA 2012 Optimistic and EFSA 2012 Pessimistic can be specified using the custom model choice. This choice allows for a sensitivity analysis where each factor is varied, one at the time.

Unit.Name: EC 2018 - Dietary CRA - Tier I
Unit.Description: Concentration model settings according to the Tier I scenario for Dietary CRA established by EC 2018.

Unit.Name: EC 2018 - Dietary CRA - Tier II
Unit.Description: Concentration model settings according to the Tier II scenario for dietary CRA established by EC 2018.

Unit.Name: EFSA 2012 - Acute dietary exposure assessment - Pessimistic
Unit.Description: Concentration model settings according to the pessimistic scenario for acute dietary exposure assessment based on the methodology presented by EFSA 2012.

Unit.Name: EFSA 2012 - Chronic dietary exposure assessment - Pessimistic
Unit.Description: Concentration model settings according to the pessimistic scenario for chronic dietary exposure assessment based on the methodology presented by EFSA 2012.

Unit.Name: EFSA 2022 - Dietary CRA - Tier I
Unit.Description: Module settings according to the Tier I scenario of the EFSA 2022 methodology for dietary CRA.

Unit.Name: EFSA 2022 - Dietary CRA - Tier II
Unit.Description: Module settings according to the Tier II scenario of the EFSA 2022 methodology for dietary CRA.
